title: secondary missions - should we have more?
body:
i don't know about everyone else but i think more secondary missions would make the game more fun and people may enjoy it more. the rengar and kha'zix mission has popped up the most and when it does i see team mates try harder to make there part of the mission complete and win. we also have the lissandra, ash and sejuani mission but this one adds little to nothing ot the game like rengar and kha'zix's. it's a shame that we don't have more since we have quite a few possibilities for it, e.g. leona and diana mission, they fight and they get a small buff to there abilities. other possibilities are darius and garen as leaders of there armies. numerous other one's and a change to the freijlord mission.

unfortunately these missions can also lead to major abuse if the players messes up by getting cought out, or making a bad play. as with rengar and kha'zix these buffs make rengar much stronger and kha'zix harder to kill but not much of a buff as rengars

share your thought's on other possible missions or any other thoughts!

replies.body:
I've always thought we should have objectives in the game. Stuff like:

1. Get a double kill with 1 ability.
2. Only get assists one game.
3. Have over 90 cs by 10 minutes
4. Land over 500 hooks.

League is spaghetti code though, some I'm not sure if they have the infrastructure in place to do more stuff like this. They shouldn't add too many mini-games IMO, you'd have something to work towards if they did objectives.
